meanings.definition: To surpass in brightness or shine.
meanings.sent1: The sun outgleams the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: Her smile outgleams all others in the room.
meanings.sent3: The firefly outgleams the streetlight, showing off its natural glow.
meanings.sent4: The diamond outgleams all other gems in the jewelry store.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse outgleams the moon on a clear night, guiding ships safely to shore.

meanings.definition: To outshine or outdo in brilliance.
meanings.sent1: His artwork outgleams the rest of the exhibit.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display outgleams the city lights on New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape outgleams the villain's dark cloak, symbolizing hope and justice.
meanings.sent4: Her intelligence outgleams her classmates, always coming up with innovative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The singer's voice outgleams all others, captivating the audience with its beauty.
